record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.J. Res. 92
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.J. Res. 92 -- (Senate - June 06, 2008)

[Page: S5375]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand H.J. Res. 92 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A resolution (H.J. Res. 92) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
